name.en: Tax ID (DIČ) - Ministry of Finance of the Czech Republic

description.en:
A VAT registration number (DIČ) is a unique and unambiguous identification of each entity or individual that is a taxpayer. The tax identification number is assigned only after the entity, natural, or legal person obtains its IČO (unique identification number). Note that the list CZ-ICO (https://org-id.guide/list/CZ-ICO) might therefore provide a better set of identifiers for legal entities.

You can search by VAT (DIČ) number of the VAT payer registered in the Czech Republic. You can also use your company ID, company name or your business name and surname if you want to verify your VAT payer details.

access.onlineAccessDetails:
A DIČ number can be validated by entering it in the search box on this page: https://adisspr.mfcr.cz/dpr/DphReg.

 A third-party site (https://www.kurzy.cz/dic/) also allows searches on a company or individual's name. Enter your search terms in the `Vyhledávání v registru plátců DPH` section and click `Vyhledat registraci`.
